Apple___Apple_scab.Description: A fungal disease causing dark, sunken lesions on apples.
Apple___Apple_scab.Diagnosis: Fungal disease causing dark, sunken lesions on apples.
Apple___Apple_scab.Treatment: Fungicides such as chlorothalonil or captan.
Apple___Apple_scab.Prevention: Use resistant varieties, manage moisture levels.
Apple___Apple_scab.Monitoring: Regularly inspect apples for lesions. Practice good orchard sanitation, monitor for disease symptoms, and apply fungicides as needed.

Apple___Cedar_apple_rust.Treatment_Timing: Apply during early stages of disease.
